page.title: 04LONGFIELD CENTRE-PRESTWICH
page.content: A whole network of small cobbled streets was demolished to make way for the Longfield Shopping Centre. In a recent survey it was obvious that it attracted people from outside the immediate area, and that the "village" is no longer such. The people interviewed came mainly to shop and did so several times a week. They enjoyed living in Prestwich because of the friendliness of the people, the pleasant surroundings and the convenience in travelling to Manchester and Bury. A leisure centre and swimming pool were the amenities they would most like to see in the Longfield area.The many changes were thought to be good.
